RESEARCHER - Country: '{TOKEN:ATTRIBUTE_1}'?

Does legislation require that mining, gas and oil development projects prepare an environmental impact assessment prior to the award of any mineral rights or project implementation?

$(document).ready(function() { var user = '{user.shown}'; if(user == '1') { } else { $('#question{self.qid}').hide(); } });

category.label: Yes. Legislation requires elaboration of an environmental impact assessment prior to the award of any mineral rights or project implementation.
No. Legislation does not require preparation of an environmental impact assessment for mining, gas and oil projects.
